Home.OneStopDestDesc: Use Giggles! to fill in and track daily reports sheets for daily attendance, activities like naps, foods, pottys and other infant/kid activities.
Home.SavesTimeDesc: With Giggles! you eliminate paper by tracking reports/sheets and analyzing them through graphs and charts so you concentrate on important things i.e.Kids
Home.ReportAnythinhDesc: Report any kind of activity like attendance, naps, foods etc. We are working hard on gathering and will be coming up with new reports, charts on a constant basis.
Home.ForDayCareDesc: Register your family day care with us one time. Add any number of kids to the day care. Manage their reports and daily sheets for all daily activities. Moniter the kids attendance. Search and analyze the reports for improvements.
Home.ForParentsDesc: As a Parent, search for your email provided to the day care and create an account with us for one time. You will be able to access your kids daily reports, activities sheets and other information. Emails about the same will be send at the end of the day.
Home.DesktopNotEnoughDesc: What better way to access GigglesWare on the run than using our Mobile Apps!
Home.DesktopNotEnoughSubDesc: Check Out out Android App and Apple iPhone App
Home.OneStopSolution: One stop solution for Family Day Care Management
Home.NowIPhoneApp: GigglesWare now has an iPhone App
Home.CustomReport: Create Custom Reports for Kids Now
Home.InstantLog: Now you can instantly log or report kids activities using Instant Log feature
Home.Assistant: Introducing GigglesWare smart Assitant. Tap! Talk! and we load the reports
